course.title: 德国留学DIY自助向导系列课程
course.headline: 只需8节课的时间，你就能从留学小白变成有方向和目的地自助准备留德达人
course.description: 感谢你来到德国留学DIY自助向导系列课的课程描述。因为我曾经准备德国留学时没有捷径，也不愿意花昂贵的中介费，所以全是自己一手操办，虽然中间问了一些学姐学长的经验，不过在自己准备时才发现很多地方我是需要自己去搜寻和摸索。由于没有经验，当时花了很多时间和经历去搜索学校，查询专业，联系学校，整理材料，而且还绕了不少弯路。因为自己经历过，所以希望帮助和我一样打算到德国留学的后辈们，让你们能不再重蹈我艰辛的覆辙，为你节省时间，让你少走弯路。在经过将近150个小时的材料整理和准备，视频录制和编辑后，我将自己的亲身经历浓缩成8节课分享给你。在课程中，我还会分享自己的心得体会，让你在准备德国留学时能更有方向和针对性，并且在各个考核阶段能一次通过。

related.title: 秋冬日常美妆
related.headline: 美妆
related.description: 适合新手的美妆教程来啦，可以了解如何护肤，知道如何使妆容服帖。你可以从这个课程中学到很多比如底妆，遮瑕，眼妆眉毛，高光阴影以及口红。本课程适合喜欢橘色系妆容的小姐姐们，适合秋冬很暖心的妆容。妆容适合各个年龄段的女生日常出门。

related.title: Python深度学习与Tensorflow2实战（2020新版）
related.headline: tensorflow2版本实战
related.description: 课程主要包括两大模块（原理和实战），首先会通俗讲解深度学习中各大经典网络架构并基于tensorflow2版本进行实例演示，详解网络模型训练方法与策略。项目实战全部基于真实数据集与实际任务进行展开，零基础入门深度学习与TF框架并进行进阶提升！

related.title: Blindagem de Diamante
related.headline: Banho de Verniz
related.description: Blindagem de diamante está aqui a solução para favorecer unhas fracas e quebradiças ,nessa técnica você profissional aprenderá fazer uma cobertura total sobe as unhas naturais da cliente , alternativa perfeita para as clientes que não gostam de alongamentos mais querem ter suas unhas bonitas, saudáveis e compridas ,a blindagem favorece o crescimento da unha natural sendo assim faz a ação de que elas não lasquem ,trinquem . abram ou rompam processo realizado em 40minutos, temos uma técnica especial de bônus esperando por você... gostou ???? ficou interessada em aprender essa técnica sem necessidade de alongar as unhas das suas clientes????? Então venha agora mesmo e adquira seu curso

related.title: Musical Mother Tongue: Off-Bench Piano Success With Pre-K's
related.headline: Every song and move you need for better rhythm, concentration, and memory from your youngest pianists.
related.description: Hiya, piano teacher!Want more fun and progress for your youngest piano students? Want to feel  in tune with the kids in your studio, so the kids go from chaotic to cooperative? Want to use your existing piano method book or curriculum with maximum success? If you:Notice your piano student getting distracted but want him to focus on music for the whole lessonFeel she has a rhythm problem and want to get her on the beatWant to feel energized for your family and hobbies after lessonsAre tired of books geared at older kids or with only written instructions and no video demos for moving active little ones...Then Musical Mother Tongue is for you!Gently guided by a certified music development specialist, this experience helps piano teachers of kids age 3 to 5 become excellent music models for their students. It helps teachers establish a child's initial rhythmic, tonal, & movement vocabulary in a fun, heart-connected way... so that his piano playing is fabulous and he keeps 100% focus in the lesson. And so you go home with enough energy to enjoy your family and your favorite hobbies. No more exhaustion from conflicts and constant redirecting during your lessons.Most importantly, it launches child audiation, the often neglected inner musical instrument that 'plays' all the others.In 4, 10-minute video sessions, and with 4 printable PDF lesson plans,  Musical Mother Tongue gives you all the tricks to help kids:move smoothly to music and gain a steady beat in multiple metersstay focused throughout a lesson , both at a the keyboard and off benchsing a hello song and a folk song  in contrasting tonalities in prep for playing on pianochant two rhythmic poems in contrasting meters in prep for playing on piano

related.title: 「世界で7万人が受講！未経験からWebプログラマーになるための全て」2018年最新版
related.headline: Masaaki Hatano 監修、2018年の最新版へupdate済み（初心者向け・日本語吹き替え版）
related.description: アイディアを形にする為のWeb講座（日本語吹き替え版） "HTML / CSS / JavaScript / MySQL / PHP / JSON / AJAX / JQUERY / HTML5 / CSS3" 面白いアイディアを思いついた！でも、どうやったら作れるんだろう。。。？ なかなか技術者の人と話が噛み合ない、、、 自分で何かサービスを作ってみたい！ でも、何から始めたら良いか解らない。。。 そんな方の為に作ったコースです。（本コースは全米ベストセラーの"Become a Web Developer From Scratch"の日本語吹き替え版です）。 本コースでは出来るだけ簡単に、web開発に必要な基本的知識の全てをビデオを使って説明していきます。もちろん解らない時にはいつでも質問でき、日本人インストラクターから直接返信が日本語で貰えるようになっています。 一個一個のビデオは5分〜10分程なので無理無く始められ、一通りやることで自分で考えたアイディアを簡単に形に出来ます。 まずはローコストでwebの事を勉強したいという方は是非お試し下さい。 （受講される前に以下の注意事項、用語集、リンク集をご確認下さい） キャンペーン情報などはこちらで確認できます。 ＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿ 注意事項： ＊ビデオの速度に関して＊ 吹き替え版、また初心者の方向けの為、ビデオがゆっくりに感じる方もいるかと思います。その場合にはビデオ右下のボタンから再生スピードを変更出来ますので、そちらで調整をお願いします。 ＊頂いた質問への返答に関して＊ 頂いた質問には出来るだけ24時間以内に返答出来るよう心がけておりますが都合により多少遅れる事も御座います。また3日経っても返事が無い場合は確認が出来ていない場合がありますのでお手数ですが再度ご質問頂ければ幸いです。 ＊30日の返金保証に関して＊ Udemyではコースをご購入頂いた30日後までは無条件で全額返金を行っております。仮に思っていた内容とコースが違った場合はこちらの機能をお使い下さい。 ＊修正、訂正に関して＊ 本コースは技術やテクノロジートレンドに合わせて日々更新していきます。また、不明確な部分や間違いのある部分はご指摘の多い順に修正させて頂きます。皆様の声を元に随時更新しより良いものを作って行きたいと思いますので宜しくお願いします。 ＊ライフタイムアクセスに関して＊ 本コースは“ライフタイムアクセス"を導入しております。これはコースをなるべく多くの方が無理なく受講出来るよう。受講期間を一切儲けないという事です。一度受講されましたらその権利は一生使えますので特に更新や受講期限はありません。 ＊円ドル相場＊ 本コースはpaypal若しくはクレジットでの決済を推奨しております。コースの性質上表示がドルになっておりますが現在の換算レートはこちらでご確認下さい。 ＊用語集、リンク集＊ 用語に関して、吹き替え版の為、英語よりの表現を使っている事もあります。以下添付ファイルにて日本語表現の用語集を用意しましたのでそちらと照らし合わせる事で両方の表現を覚えてみてください。 本コースでは多くのリンクを推奨しております。以下添付ファイルのリンク集にまとまっていますので参照してください。 ＊なお、本コースの内容及び、料金体制等は予告無く変更される事があります事を予めご了承下さい。

related.title: Career Mind Mastery: Bring Who You Are to What You Do
related.headline: Your Talents + This System = Total Awesomeness.
related.description: Your Talents + This System = Total Awesomeness. Well, sure, we're having a bit of fun, but it really is a great combination. A simple system plus the talents that you ALREADY HAVE will be a knockout combination whoever you are, whatever you're trying to do. The biggest tragedy of most people's careers is that they either feel trapped in a career they don't like and wouldn't choose or they achieve significantly less success than they expected despite having far better skills and performing to a much higher level than their peers. It's a massive waste of human potential and it's an individual tragedy for those people. You can achieve the success you want by Changing Careers - you just need to follow the right strategies and have the right mindset. This is the program you will learn how to Change Career by exactly what you need to do, in a simple step-by-step way to virtually guarantee success. You still have to do the work, but this system really is the minimum will system that will make it as easy as possible for you to bring who you are to what you do and hence create your dream career. Things should be made as simple as possible, but no simpler - Einstein Things should be made as easy as possible, but no easier - Cassidy To your great success, Tom and Angela (Course photo Kieran Doherty, © 2012 Kieran Doherty photography. All rights reserved http://www.kierandoherty.com/)

related.title: Master Your Mindset & Brain: Framestorm Your Way to Success
related.headline: Excel in any situation. Tweak your mindset in brain-smart ways. Master class in reframing based on neuroscience.
related.description: Do you also find yourself in an ever-changing business environment? In the midst of complex decision-making processes? And with expectations of constant peak performance? If so, this course is for you! The course helps individuals and teams grow their mental flexibility and self-regulation so that they can succeed in business. When you take this course, you: - learn a unique three-step reframing method, Framestorm - understand the key neuroscientific principles behind Framestorm and how to apply them - get inspired via a lot of powerful cases Framestorm is a registered, brain-based and elegant multiple reframing method. It helps you to cope with - and transform - mental hindrances. And it helps you move from resisting and feeling stuck, angry, sad or fearful to feeling optimally resourceful and at choice. If facilitating change, staying cool under pressure, collaborating with others and/or decision making and problem solving is your business - or if you want to boost your innovation and communication skills - this course is definitely for you. In a typical "Anette Prehn fashion", this course makes complicated things seem easy to grasp and wonderfully fun to apply. If you liked "The Neuroscience of Reframing - And How to Do It", you are going to love this master class. For more about Anette Prehn's down-to-earth training style and the gain of the participants, feel free to check out the testimonials of "The Neuroscience of Reframing - And How to Do It" or visit www.anetteprehn.com/testimonials

related.title: OpenBSD快速入门
related.headline: 关注网络安全? 开始学习OpenBSD吧！
related.description: 担心您的网站或电脑遭受黑客攻击，隐私被盗用？那就试试使用OpenBSD吧！作为黑客大会上最常使用的操作系统，OpenBSD的安全性深受专业人士的认可；同时作为一个很“小众”的操作系统，非安全专业用户会觉得它略显神秘与陌生。在这个课程中我就和大家一起学习OpenBSD操作系统的使用。整个课程历时约3个小时，由12个录屏视频（screencast）组成；通过观看这些视频，你可以了解OpenBSD系统的基本管理与使用，以及如何把它配置成一个“Apache(Nginx)+MySQL+PHP”的WEB平台；如果你在观看视频的过程中有任何疑问，可以在udemy的这个平台上提出(I take questions in English as well)；我每周都会（至少2次， 不定期）到这里来。

related.title: Gephi 中文教程
related.headline: 介绍Gephi的基本使用方法，有大量实际操作的视频演示，便于初学者快速入门。
related.description: Gephi 是一款网络分析领域的数据可视化处理软件，开发者对它寄予的希望是：成为 “数据可视化领域的Photoshop” 。 为推动 Gephi 在中文领域的发展，分享实验室  以MOOC模式在  udemy.com  推出了Gephi中文视频教程。Gephi中文教程介绍了Gephi是什么样的软件，提供什么样的功能，各项主要功能的操作方式等等。  Gephi中文教程采用  CC BY-NC 3.0  版权的协议发布。关于此 Gephi 中文教程如果您有任何问题或建议，可以通过电子邮件（ digitip#gmail.com ）与讲者取得联系，也可以在一些社交网络比如推特微博等查找 @ooof 获取他的更多消息。

related.title: Energy Economics and the Environment
related.headline: Environmental issues require trade-offs, primarily in how we use energy. A former White House economist offers answers.
related.description: A Faculty Project Course - Best Professors Teaching the World Energy use and its impact on the environment will be two of the most important issues of the 21st century. The large role of energy in geo-political relationships combined with the fact that most of the greenhouse gas emissions associated with global climate change come from energy production means the energy sector is poised for dramatic change, and thus great opportunity. This course is designed to be a primer for potential entrepreneurs, investors, managers and policy makers on energy and environmental issues. Topics will include environmental economics, energy economics, environmental ethics, oil sector, the electricity sector, alternative energy, sustainability, climate change and climate policy.
